original: 潁川潁陰人，西晉官員，荀彧後人，司馬懿外孫。與兄長荀愷自幼即被司馬懿器重，司馬懿稱荀愷為虎子，稱荀悝為龍子。
text: Yingchuan Yingyin people, Western Jin officials, Xunyu descendants, grandson of Sima Yi. He and his elder brother Xun Kai were highly valued by Sima Yi since he was a child. Sima Yi called Xun Kai a tiger and Xun Kai as a dragon.
